definition: traffic/to drive (i.e. travel in a vehicle)
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

sentences.english: Don't forget to indicate before turning.
sentences.chinese: 拐彎之前別忘記指示車行方向。

sentences.english: Take the vehicle on a short journey, to warm the transmission up to normal operating temperature.
sentences.chinese: 渣車行一段短路程，幫個波箱熱身去到工作溫度。

sentences.english: May I drop the car off at your office in Washington?
sentences.chinese: 我可以把租車放在華盛頓的車行嗎？

sentences.english: We have the example of the banking system and the car industry.
sentences.chinese: 我們有着金融和汽車行業的前車之鑑。

sentences.english: The center tramway portion depresses below the roadway elevation.
sentences.chinese: 中間電車道落低到車行道以下。

sentences.english: Local automotive industry is doing a portal station.
sentences.chinese: 正在做一個地方汽車行業門戶站。

sentences.english: Tom glanced impatiently around the garage.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆不耐煩地向車行四面張望。

sentences.english: When driving through the Second Yangtze Bridge, I saw the great Yangtze River.
sentences.chinese: 當我們的車行駛過二橋時，我看到了美麗的長江。

sentences.english: Car dealers area has eleven parks.
sentences.chinese: 車行區有袋鼠鴕鳥園等十一個園區。

sentences.english: As the hus was passing half way through the mountain I saw a sea of green trees and bamboos.
sentences.chinese: 當車行在半山腰時，我看到一片綠樹和竹的海洋。

sentences.english: What is the problem with Mr. Scott's second garage?
sentences.chinese: 斯科特先生的第二間車行有什麼問題？

sentences.english: Walkouts have spread through the industry during the past month as workers express discontent about pay.
sentences.chinese: 上月以來，由於工人不滿薪酬，汽車行業罷工不斷。

sentences.english: The differential is widely used in automobile industry.
sentences.chinese: 差速器廣泛應用於汽車行業。

sentences.english: Björn Hauber owns extensive experience in the automotive and business consulting industry.
sentences.chinese: 郝博先生擁有豐富的汽車行業及商業專業諮詢經驗。

sentences.english: We have luxury cars. This one is the most elegant on our lot.
sentences.chinese: 我們有豪華車，這是我們車行最上檔的一輛車。

sentences.english: Never again will the automotive industry experience this kind of growth.
sentences.chinese: 體驗這種增長是汽車行業絕無僅有的機會。

definition: to gallop/speedily/to proceed to/to pilot (ship, plane etc)/to sail
car or other vehicle (bicycle, truck etc)
to travel along a route (of vehicles etc)
to pull up (stop one's vehicle)/to park/(of a machine) to stop working/to stall
to drive a vehicle/movement of vehicles
